greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the partial sums of the reciprocals of (k+1)*(4*k+3) = A033991(k+1), for k >= 0.
comment: The corresponding numerators are given in A294516. See this for a reference, the definition of V(4,3;n), and the limit V(4,3).
example: For the rationals V(4,3;n) and the limit V(4,3) see A294516.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 07 2017
